sentence.Network_en: The enquiry dug deeper into the alleged financial misdeeds of his government.

sentence.Network_en: He was jailed for five years as an alleged British spy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被指控为英国间谍，入狱关押了5年。

sentence.Network_en: We were asked to investigate the alleged inconsistencies in his evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们被要求对他证词中的前后矛盾之处进行调查。

entry.tran: 声称的；被断言的；涉嫌的
entry.def: An alleged fact has been stated but has not been proved to be true.

example.ex: They have begun a hunger strike in protest at the alleged beating.
example.tran: 他们开始绝食以抗议有人所宣称的殴打行为。
